name: Tabbycat
description: Debating tournament tabulation software for British Parliamentary and a variety of two-team parliamentary formats

DJANGO_SECRET_KEY.description: A secret key for cryptographic signing of user sessions.

TAB_DIRECTOR_EMAIL.description: Your email address. Tabbycat's developers may need to contact you to help diagnose any unexpected errors.

TIME_ZONE.description: The time zone name in the IANA tz database for the tournament's location. Examples: America/Los_Angeles, Europe/Dublin, Africa/Johannesburg. You can look up yours in the 'TZ*' column at http://wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_tz_database_time_zones#List
